alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 18 at 1:47AM PST until December 18 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with local gusts 35 to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Gusty winds may occur in the Cajon and Banning Passes today. Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
